title: Technospeak // Sankalan 2018
content:
Technospeak

Sankalan 2018 in Association presents Workshop on Information Security

self.teamSize = 2

if self.isWinner():
  prize = self.prize
  self.receive(prize)

Round #1

Participants should mail their article to technospeak@ducs.in with subject as ‘Workshop on Information Security’

Round #2

Subsequently, based on technical review, the authors of the best eight selected articles would be invited to give a presentation of their topics (10-20 minutes) on April 8th, 2018 at Department of Computer Science,University of Delhi.

We invite the participants to make a presentation on a topic in Information Security. The participants are expected to write an article on a topic of their choice with in the scope of Information Security. The article may be ​based on ​original research or a review article of the work in some area within the domain of Information Security.

 

Further details

  • Participants should mail their article to technospeak@ducs.in with subject as
    ‘Workshop on Information Security’ Rules follow:
    1. Format of the article: PDF
    2. Font: Times New Roman
    3. Size: 14.
    4. The article should include an abstract.
    5. The article should be restricted to 10 pages.
    6. Other details to be submitted along with the article:
      Contact details of the participants (maximum Two): Name, Email Id, College, Contact Number
      (if you've registered through our portal, just send your ticket 'ID')
    7. Last date of submission is April 5th, 2018.
  • Note: this workshop is open for students of Dept. of Computer Science as well.
  • Contact for details: Ajay Jajoo
Register
